title: SOS TrueType, CE glyphs and PowerPoint 2003
content:
Hi, I wonder how to export TrueType or OpenType font to work correctly in MS Excel. When I use font exported from FL Studio 5 in PowerPoint 2003 for Windows, Central European glyphs are always replaced with Arial. My client need the font ASAP... The font works perfectly in other applications (Adobe, MS Word...)

Please help...
author: filip blazek
